item.title: By: Anne Selby
item.dc:creator: Anne Selby
item.description: I am just about to go and get the ingredients to make these wonderful nuts, to go with Goats Cheese and Beetroot Salad. I can not wait to try this tonight.
item.content:encoded: I am just about to go and get the ingredients to make these wonderful nuts, to go with Goats Cheese and Beetroot Salad. I can not wait to try this tonight.

item.title: By: Ivan
item.dc:creator: Ivan
item.description: Thanks for this recipe, first attempt ended up coated in sugar like yours (I too was scared about overdoing it without a thermometer. Second time round they were delicious.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for this recipe, first attempt ended up coated in sugar like yours (I too was scared about overdoing it without a thermometer. Second time round they were delicious.

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: That is an amazing photo!!! I mean anyone reading this must be drooling. Copying the recipe now. My kids will love nibbling on these. I think you could crush them and add them to ice cream, a panna cotta...I can think of lots of things to do with them. Kudos!
item.content:encoded:
That is an amazing photo!!! I mean anyone reading this must be drooling.
Copying the recipe now. My kids will love nibbling on these.
I think you could crush them and add them to ice cream, a panna cotta…I can think of lots of things to do with them.
Kudos!

item.title: By: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.dc:creator: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.description: These just look so deliciously messy. I don't really like almonds but I think these just might turn me :)
item.content:encoded: These just look so deliciously messy. I don’t really like almonds but I think these just might turn me ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Marilyn
item.dc:creator: Marilyn
item.description:
Wow, they look great and delicious!!! I love Vienna almonds too and the smells of the QVB nut shop is sooo good, I bought some from it several times and my dad also love their caramelised macadamia. Is the nuts shop still in there, as I haven't seen it last time I went there, or do anybody know where I can find the shop now?
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
Wow, they look great and delicious!!!
I love Vienna almonds too and the smells of the QVB nut shop is sooo good, I bought some from it several times and my dad also love their caramelised macadamia. Is the nuts shop still in there, as I haven’t seen it last time I went there, or do anybody know where I can find the shop now?

Thanks.

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: They look delicious! I can't wait to see what you'll be making with them!
item.content:encoded: They look delicious! I can’t wait to see what you’ll be making with them!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Hehe I've smelt those nuts at the QVB and bought some as they smelled so good! I like the ones from the Nut Shop in The Strand Arcade :)
item.content:encoded: Hehe I’ve smelt those nuts at the QVB and bought some as they smelled so good! I like the ones from the Nut Shop in The Strand Arcade ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: mademoiselle dÃ©licieuse
item.dc:creator: mademoiselle dÃ©licieuse
item.description: Love Vienna almonds and esp the almonds because of their smoky crunch. Great smashed up with vanilla ice-cream as well =)
item.content:encoded: Love Vienna almonds and esp the almonds because of their smoky crunch. Great smashed up with vanilla ice-cream as well =)

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Ahha, so you have to roast the almonds first. I think that was my problem. I didn't measure the temperature either, so mine were a little overdone. It's nice to have a proper recipe, and I look forward to hearing your next one!
item.content:encoded: Ahha, so you have to roast the almonds first. I think that was my problem. I didn’t measure the temperature either, so mine were a little overdone. It’s nice to have a proper recipe, and I look forward to hearing your next one!

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: Oh, I can't believe it! I love Vienna Almonds. When I was little we could get big jars of them at Christmas and I so looked forward to them. Now, it is very hard to find them. So, I'm glad to have a recipe. Thank you.
item.content:encoded: Oh, I can’t believe it! I love Vienna Almonds. When I was little we could get big jars of them at Christmas and I so looked forward to them. Now, it is very hard to find them. So, I’m glad to have a recipe. Thank you.
